page.title: 08ENTERTAINMENT EAST HADDON
page.content: There's nothing to do in East Haddon is a frequent cry. It is true that there is no cinema or dance hall. However a wide range of activities exist e.g. Adult Education 2 nights/week at school. Adult Education 1 afternoon/week at the village hall Football club and Cricket club Brownies in the school. Handbell ringing Church Bellringing and choir. Women's Institute Wightman Players - Drama Group Junior Wightman Players - Drama Group Senior Citizens. Playgroup fund raising functions Friends of the School - A varied programme of events throughout the year which are open to everyone. Squash Club.
